item.description:
Hi Everyone,

As you know, Dameron Midgett, Founder and Director of Source Energy Healing Arts, Advanced Certified Tantra Educator (Source School of Tantra, Maui, Hawaii), and Reiki Master, will be sharing with us an introduction to Tantra at our first Meetup.

The date is set for January 17, 2008, and the meeting will start at 7 pm and end by 10 pm. The facility is located just off Route 93, easy access from southern New Hampshire and northeastern Massachusetts, and according to the map, this location is no more than an hour drive for each of us.

For Details and Directions, click this link:
http://files.meetup.c...

Three great benefits to this location: If there is sufficient interest, this facility would be a great location for us to have a regular Meetup, there is room for the group to grow :) and Dameron indicated he would be interested in continuing to share with us on a regular basis!

In the meantime, please be sure to RSVP and download the article that Dameron has provided in our Files section entitled, "Introduction to the Tantric Path" - the link for his article is here:
http://files.meetup.c...

Also, please consider a donation of $20 to support Dameron when he comes to share with us as well as to cover the cost of the space, refreshments, etc.

We look forward to meeting you!

Love and Blessings,
Parvati

LOCATION DETAILS
Walnut Hill Conference and Retreat Center
81 Chester Road
Raymond, NH 03077
Phone: 603-895-2437
Website: http://www.creativecl...
Directions and map: http://www.creativecl...
item.why: For our first Meetup, Dameron Midgett, Founder and Director of Source Energy Healing Arts, Advanced Certified Tantra Educator (Source School of Tantra, Maui, Hawaii), and Reiki Master, will be sharing with us an introduction to Tantra.
item.name: New England Tantric Meetup - Thursday, January 17, 2008
